title: Opinion
selftext:
Xi Jinping is the most powerful leader in this world followed by Narender Modi, Joe Biden, Vladimir Putin and Emmanuel Macron..  
[https://maximuscorporation.in/web-stories/top-5-leades-in-the-world/](https://maximuscorporation.in/web-stories/top-5-leades-in-the-world/)
comments: Without criteria mentioned, this is pretty vague...
Lol, Modi's more powerful than Biden?

Yesssss he’s the first human on earth 
Big bang happened because of him
